content.detailedDescription: Husband and i were sight-seeing and driving towards park city, utah along rt. 224.  i was taking many pics with iphone 4 through car window of wasatch mountains....The first pic submitted was taken through car window.  i then asked him to pull off road so i could take a photo outside of car.  the other 2 are without car window interference.   when i reviewed the pictures a week or so later, i noticed an object above the mountain range that i did not perceive with my human eye when i took pictures.  if you zoom in, it appears that a tether is coming out of the object and into the mountain.  not sure if this is optical illusion with mountain range however, in the first pic, the object looks like it is part of a a rock face set in a snow cap. the curvy looking "tether" could be rock ridge or ski trail.  however, in the following 2 pictures, the "tether" becomes rigid and manipulated.
content.summary: Did not see starship image with human eye when photos were taken.

content.detailedDescription:
i was getting in my car to go to a church meeting, an a.R.E. meeting.
 and as i was getting in my car i looked up at the sky, it was blue and 
 some clouds, and i noticed for a few seconds a bright silvery metal oval
 or roundish object stationary next to a cloud. i sat in my car and looked
 again, realizing i had seen a ufo. i had only taken my eyes off it for a
 few seconds and it was gone. it must have went into the clouds. i kept
 looking to see if i could see it again, but i didn't. it was almost as if
 it was watching me, then hid. thats the feeling i got, like there was
 defintely a connection, just a gut instinct i guess. i felt it was there
 for me to see it and then it hid. but this object seemed to have something
 that went around it in the middle, like maybe windows or huge rivets. it
 was definetly a ufo, no doubt.
content.summary: I was getting inside my car to go to a church meeting and i just happened to glance up to the sky and i saw a bright metalic oval shaped object, it was very shiney, almost like silver, but it was defintely metalic. i saw it close to some clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
Mi esposa y yo ve���amos pel���cula cuando de pronto fallo la luz con parpadeos y
casi se va en su totalidad cuando me asome por la ventana vi un destello de luz que venia de atr���s de la casa no se si un flash de una c���mara ya que atr���s hay un edificio no pudo ser un transformador por que no escucho ning���n ruido solo vi ese destello, al ver ese destello me pregunte que hay para tomar fotos y vi al cielo y vi este punto de luz brillante y parpadeante que se mov���a lentamente en espiral de norte a sur muy alto,le dije a mi esposa mira si ves lo que yo y si lo confirmo que lo ve���a, no era un avi���n ya que seguido pasan por esta zona y pasaba alguno y sus luces eran muy diferentes al igual que el movimiento y altura no le perd��� la vista por lo menos unos 20 a 25 minutos.
me sent���a muy euf���rico y con la mala suerte de no tener mi c���mara ese d���a, pero con la gratitud de su presencia y sent��� una paz muy intensa.
content.summary: Una muy pequeña luz que se movia en como en espirale de norte a sur

content.detailedDescription:
sal��� a jugar con mi pelota nueva muy r���pido despues de comer.
 yo solo en el patio de la casa le di un una patada a la pelota muy fuerte al cielo y mirando la pelota este objeto paso volando y me quede observandolo por unos 10 segundos este siguio su curso y yo volte para ver si algien mas lo veia y no tenia a nadie mas viendo.
 este tenia una forma circula de colo entre cafe, amarillo, negro y naranja con otras peque���as ruedas que formaban su forma. me sent��� emocionado y con mucha euforia con ganas de gritar para que todos lo vieran pero me quede viendo.
content.summary: Un platillo obscuro de buen tamaño que no emitia ruido y volaba mas o menos lento en direccion a la 25 zona militar.

content.detailedDescription: I got up early to take a picture of the grass i cut so after i snapped a picture something told me to look up to the left then my heart stopped and i felt scared it was a saucer picking up or dropping something i had chills and wanted to leave my cousin was stuck but saw it then it move so fast or vanished right there and we ran but i took a picture if you blow up in the upper left above the tree its there but i can make out the beams and all.
content.summary: Was out to take a pic of the grass i cut then i saw this thing carrying something or dropping something but heard no noise it was so weird and being black and from dc i never believed in ufos until last week

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in the spa under a cloudless cold night. i love to watch the winter stars and the high-altitude jetliners as they move across the night sky. the stars move slowly from east to west, and here the jetliners move swiftly from east to west as they make their way to the bay area airports. my wife went to bed early so i decided to soak in the spa for awhile (one beer when i got home and a single glass of wine with dinner). facing due south in the spa a boomerang shaped, translucent object entered my field of vision (from behind and to the right) moving from nw to se. lack of visual reference cues makes this thing impossible to size, but it moved like a big object and the reflection of the street and city lights glowed dimly off the curved bottom surface at a seemingly moderate height, well below the airliner traffic. it made no sound and really seemed to be more a boomerang shaped disturbance in the air rather than a visible object. speed was impossible to judge, except to say that it took 20 to 25 seconds to traverse my field of vision. i jumped up and stood in the spa to view as much of this thing as possible while it disappeared behind the houses across the street. this is the first clear and cloudless night in central california after many days of rain. could the airforce be out and about with some new toys?
content.summary: Boomerang shaped craft in central california

content.detailedDescription: I was on my back porch, noticed a shooting star & started scanning the sky. i first noticed the object because of the red, white, greenish blue light it was putting off. at first we thought it was a star doing something weird, my husband said "it's moving" we quickly got a telephone pole in our sight to judge the "movement" & sure enough it was ascending & descending. it looked to be a sort of zig zag pattern at the beginning then it started up & down followed by back & forth again. after seeing the movement with the lighting pattern we decided it was not a plane nor any seemingly man made object. we watched it for 15 minutes, went inside for 5 and it was gone. this is the first time i've ever encountered anything of this sort & it was amazing, whatever it was!
content.summary: Bright starlike in eastern sky, random light pattern, ascending & descending randomly

content.detailedDescription:
At about 11:20pm, 4-28-13, 3 (total) witness were looking at saturn through a telescope.  one witness stayed with telescope while 2 other witness looked (with naked eyes) at the sky around saturn (facing south/southeast).  in an instant two meteor like objects came down from space in parallel at very fast speed.  they came in at a 35 to 40 degree angle.  they left a very small trial as they came down.  my initial thought in a split second was "wow, that's weird seeing two meteors in parallel."  as soon as i thought that, the two white lights stopped their rapid descent in the sky and hovered for a second or two (at what i would guess was about 30,000 ft).  they were about 30 degrees above the horizon.  then the two lights began circling around each other in the sky almost like they were playing with each other or dancing in the sky together.  they did huge circles around each other at tremendous speed defying all physics.  both witnesses confirmed what they were seeing to each other and telling third person to come look.  the two objects were star like in appearance and less bright than most of the stars in the sky.  both objects circled around each other for about 8 seconds and then leveled out and flew away heading south towards iowa city.  as they flew away at about 30,000 feet, they left a tiny trail behind them, however, they didn't make any kind of trail while they were doing rapid circles in the sky.  objects flew away and disappeared behind house roof line.  third witness only saw the objects fly off for a second or less and didn't see objects doing circles in the night sky.  this incident happened at a different location in cedar rapids from where i live.  

both main witnesses thought had the objects went just a bit further down, neighbors roof would have blocked view and we would have missed the show and would have only thought we saw two meteors.  objects seemed to deliberately stop so we could watch them in this narrow field of vision.  i mentioned to my neighbor what i saw last night and her brother said he witnessed around 10:45pm on same night a bright white light, like a meteor, come down from space in same area we were looking and then it stopped in midair and then poof, vanished.  this person was located about 5 miles away from where i was located when these events took place.  

i had goosebumps when i was watching the two objects because i knew i was witnessing first hand something that was not man made.  the other witness wasn't as shocked as me, but he said he went from being a ufo skeptic to believer after seeing those two objects dance around in the sky.  i had my camera phone with me and thought about shooting video, but i had a feeling the objects would disappear while i was fumbling around trying to film it.  turns out i was correct as the entire event only lasted about 10 seconds.  we both agreed that had we not been together to confirm what we saw, we may have doubted what we saw altogether..  it was surreal to say the least.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Two meteor like objects doing circles in the sky

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were sitting outside in the front porch of our house watching a thunderstorm roll in. we heard a low flying plane. got up from the porch to look at the plane, as the plane was flying by we were following it. i noticed a light appear out of the clouds in front of the plane. the plane veered left,it seemed to turn away from the object.  we started looking at the light trying to figure out what it was.  as it passed over our house, the object didnt make any type of noise. it was moving at a slow rate of speed. my wife was able to take 3 pictures of the object before it disappeared in the clouds.  i have never seen anything like it before.
content.summary: Looking at storm in sky, watching low flying plane.Light appeared infront of plane.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were sitting outside in the front porch of our house watching a thunderstorm roll in. we heard a low flying plane. got up from the porch to look at the plane, as the plane was flying by we were following it. i noticed a light appear out of the clouds in front of the plane. the plane veered left,it seemed to turn away from the object.  we started looking at the light trying to figure out what it was.  as it passed over our house, the object didnt make any type of noise. it was moving at a slow rate of speed. my wife was able to take 3 pictures of the object before it disappeared in the clouds.  i have never seen anything like it before.
content.summary: Looking at storm in sky, watching low flying plane.Light appeared infront of plane.

content.detailedDescription: About 9:00 pm my husband called me and our children outside to observe 2 objects facing west and coming from south ascending north. they were bright red/orange and seemed to be blinking. the first one reached a certain height and seemed to just disappear. then the next one disappeared then 3 more came from the same direction. all of them seemed to just disappear. my husband took a photo and it looks like a ball of fire in the photo. there were airplanes that were flying  higher than the fireball looking objects. they were clearly different.
content.summary: Fireball flying craft

content.detailedDescription: I was home sitting in my chair.  i leaned back and looked out the window at the stars.  one star i noticed seemed to be pulsing more than any of the others.  given that i started seeing some red and green colors i thought it was a plane.  however i looked at it for 2 minutes and it did not move what-so-ever.  the orb was completely stationary, however the light revolved around itself and changed colors in a quick and fluid way.  a cloud bank moved in and covered up the object after a few minutes and i lost sight of it.
content.summary: Starlike glowing orb.  mostly white with a rotating mix of red, blue, and green.  completely stationary and above cloud level.

content.detailedDescription: Was using lower-powered binoculars to view saturn when sife asked what "that" was in e flashing red, blue, & green. initially thought airplane but object's lights were not consistent with navigation lights on aircraft. i am a 21 yr army vet and have seen many us and foreign aircraft ... this wasn't an aircraft with which i am familiar. after watching it hover i decided to go in for a break. after two hours the object was essentially static in its same position. three hours later it was still visible in the same trajectory and relative position (45 degrees above horizon) but noticeably smaller causing me to assume it was making  very slow progress eastward. even later that evening i could only barely make out the object but it still appeared to be flashing red, green, and blue lights (equal brightness) sequentially.
content.summary: Observed opposite of saturn in w. object slowly moved e over 5 hours

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out my window up at moon in leigh on sea essex england as i do a lot.It was a very clear night .I notist just up above me to the left a big but high glowing orange and yellow orb so i got my phone and started to film as i did i watched with my eyes on off camera as it seemed to go strait into the moon pulsing.Then it come from what look like behind moon traveling to my right getting brighter then it seemed to start going way from me over sea to kent and then lost sight over roofs i know what it was and felt very surprised to see such a thing i have sent video please contact me to let me know what it is if not a ufo.It lasted for about 2mins or more
content.summary: Looked up at moon see a big but high orange pulsating orb fly strait into seem behind moon then go across then go away from me very fast but high

content.detailedDescription: 4/27/13) at about 9:00 pm, rita, myself, her mother, and three other members of her family were sitting on the back patio of her mothers condo. the patio sits higher and overlooks much of the city of fountain hills, az. we had just returned from a dinner, and discussing events over drinks. two of the six did not drink. about 9 pm i noticed a very bright reddish orange light coming toward us in the sky. it appeared to be moving slowly and close to the flight path of commercial airline into phoenix. the item attracted our attention in that it did not strobe and is odd color and very bright intensity. the item continued moving toward our patio and stopped and hovered in front of us. i could make out it appeared round in shape. after a few seconds it continued on its path and move directly over our heads. stopping once again for a few seconds, it then appeared to change to bright white color and then appeared to fade. a person from our group moved to get a view out of the way of the tree, and said it was going up. as i came to their position i could see it was increasing in altitude at an incredible speed. once it reached a very high altitude, it looked to be a pin point among the stars behind it, it zipped off at about its initial vector at tremendous speed and then a near 40 degree turn to fly off out of view. amazed, we all went back to the patio to talk about what we just witnessed, only to look out again and see another vehicle of the same color and intensity, but shaped more in an oval or cigar shape. this item was approaching us on the same vector and speed as the initial object. it stopped on it path toward us as well and hovered for a few seconds then seemed to turn. that is the point where this video is taken. rita took this and her niece took one with her phone as well. as the object turned, it started to move away from approaching us, and began to dim in color and turned from the red-orange to a white color. it moved toward an open parking lot and basket ball court about 1,000 feet from us and hovered for a second then slowly came down to land. we all witnessed this object land on the ground in this parking lot and it appeared to be a rectangular object about 8-12 feet at its long side, and maybe a couple feet high. the niece and i jumped in her car to to to the parking lot and not knowing the area she went to the fountain area, that was too far. by the time we got back to this parking lot, the witnesses on the patio that could clearly see it said it moved over the ground to slowly and into a wash area that is dense in plant life. we could find no evidence of this touchdown last night nor on review this morning, but there were some interesting impressions in the sandy soil.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 ufo's one round hovered over us shot up and took off other hovered and landed.

content.detailedDescription: It starts as my dogs barking all the time,i go outside and look at what the dogs are barking at..I look to the west and theres 5 of them flashing colors ...Lately there here 2 week...Ive taken lots of pictures...Always the dogs start barking i go out and see if there back..Ive seen them my whole life..Sometimes they really scare me....And other times its ok...I think that sometimes there differnt types ...They always flashing colors and there getting lower and lower each time lately....I go back in the house ...Look out agian sometimes there still there and sometimes gone...
content.summary: There allways here...

content.detailedDescription: I was in my garage listening to the radio when my son yelled for me to "come see this!" i asked if it was the full moon, he said "no, just come see this!" i went outside and my wife, son and i looked up to what appeared to be a fireball in the sky. my wife asked what it was, and i wasn't sure. it wasn't a glimmering star because it was too big and appeared to be moving. it wasn't the aircraft landing lights of a plane because of the size and shape. my thought was it may be an aircraft on fire coming into bangor international airport, so i yelled to my son to grab my camera. he came back outside seconds later, and i started snapping pictures of the object. because it was getting dark and my hands were trembling my camera wouldn't auto focus but eventually i did get several pictures of the object. it appeared to almost fade out of sight, but then appeared to come back getting brighter and larger. my wife asked if it was going to crash and that it was coming right towards us. i snapped a few more pictures and the object appeared to split and disappeared. i put the pictures on my facebook wall hoping someone else had seen this, but so far i've just been ridiculed. this event happened over exeter, maine on april 27, 2013 at approximately 8:15pm. i'm 43 and worked nights for 9 years so i've seen shooting stars, aircraft, northern lights, etc., but this has me baffled and sends shivers down my spine.
content.summary: A bright light in the sky, thought it was a plane on fire

content.detailedDescription: I left a neighbors house and right outside was a car waiting for me. i got into the vehicle and was driven close to my house near a bridge. there i was drugged and tortured with sound weapons of a non lethal variety by secret government agents. then after that i saw out of an apature in space walk through a brown skinned dinosaur like entity. it smelled me and it was terrifying.
content.summary: This is of an abduction event where i saw a dinosaur like (allosaurus) alien entity.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was having a conversation out on the porch having a chat when my friend pointed out what she thought to be a comet/ shooting star but once it moved at a remarkable rate it seemed to gain altitude in a steady fluid motion. the object, i felt as if the object that i saw, i could see the doppler effect in motion. the object was made up of 4 balls/ orbs in a linear pattern. the object was fairly large at 6 inches from my eyes. this was the trail of the object. it then sped off into the distance a became a "star" before no longer becoming visible. it simply no longer was there.

 i wish to inform you that i have once before filed a report many years ago and that my claims are genuine and true if you deem my sighting to be of terrestrial origin i am fine with that finding.
content.summary: The object originally was believed to be a comet however there was no scheduled comet. the object was not a comet or asteroid

content.detailedDescription:
I live on the corner of rochester hills and shelby mi. on april 27th (saturday) i was out on my balcony. i noticed a very strange light that was flashing blue, green and white. i thought it could have been a star or planet because of the way it looked, but it seemed very bright and it was flashing incredibly fast and obviously. i called my girlfriend out to ask her opinion. upon looking she noticed an "orb" that was flashing red and white and moving to the east. we then noticed that the blue/green/white star-like "thing" was moving slowly as well. at one point it went from close-by to almost out of view (this would have to be 10+ miles) without me noticing. this means it had to travel that distance in less than 5 - 10 seconds of me looking at different parts of the sky. 


later, a ship of some sort started either flying towards us or rising from the ground over the horizon (hard to tell via perspective). i believe it was rising because i noticed that another incredibly bright light was flying just above the tree line as that ship was rising up. that ship was flying so low my girlfriend could not see it (being 1.5 feet shorter than me) and it was heading west. as the other ship was "rising" it was a bright yellow, so bright i thought it could be a spotlight on a plane. suddenly, it switched from bright, bright yellow to a dim color with flashing white and red lights. at this point it "appeared" to start flying in our direction. it flew directly over us and was clearly a triangle in shape. it had a red center light and three white lights at each point. it looked very similar to the belgium ufo in the 90s. however, the white lights were flickering in all sorts of patterns. it is possible that lights lined the sides of it, which would account for the overt light display it was "putting on" as it seemed like 20 or so lights, not just the 4 we could see. we ended up seeing at least 5 of these. 3 flew in a triangular formation incredibly high and slow, another flew almost directly over us later in the night (at this point we had relocated to an open parking lot nearby). that one did not fly strait, but instead flew on a elongated bell-curve until it flew out of sight. before it came our way, it made a flashing pattern at another light in the sky as if it was "communicating" (one of the star-like lights). that light disappeared for a few seconds, then came back as if it turned off and then on again. all of these ships flashed lights in different ways. none of these "came from" the star like (blue/green/white light) ufos. 


as i said, i left and went to an open parking lot. i noticed that the "star-like" light had two twins that formed a triangular formation. there was about a mile - 3 miles in between them (best guess) and one was emitting and absorbing orbs. some we lit up, some not when they came out/went in. however, even without their lights "on", it was possible to see them as they reflected the lights of the star-like ufo. there were a lot of these orbs, potentially hundreds of sightings over the three hours. they would line up and flash in patterns, they would move and take sharp turns and they would dart across the sky with great speed. it was like a meteor shower at certain moments. we watched these things move across the entire sky, east to west, in less than a second. however, they would stop and flash for a while then move again. they were so fast, we would often watch them move from one side of the sky to the other in the time it took the orb to "flash" (meaning we caught its movement while flashing). we even saw an orb moving slowly then randomly split into two red orbs that moved quick. it was astonishing.

there was a lot of activity that night, but that about sums it all up. this went on for three hours. we also saw and heard planes fly over. the differences were staggering in terms of sound and lights. the planes were very consistent with the flashing and were audible. all other sightings were not making any noise and often changed their flashing patterns/colors.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: 3 hours of 5 or more "ships", hundreds of orbs and 3 "mother-ships" of sort that ejected and absorbed the orbs.

content.detailedDescription:
it was about sunset. we'd just managed to get some nice photos of cockatoos and had come back outside to take photos of this glorious sunset over the mountains. while watching we saw a glowing object rising behind some of the clouds. i assumed it was a plane or a star at first, it was so bright. the other witness believed that it was rising up, not towards us, and i wasn't sure... but i had to agree with her after a few more seconds. it was so bright as well. 
i still believed it to be a plane.
then it started to leave a trail of light and it was so bright that i started to doubt it. the other witness took photos of the sunset and the object. this object rose for about thirty seconds, max, before vanishing behind some thick clouds. the other witness could see it behind the clouds, it was so bright, she described it as if she could see the moon on the other side. 
we waited to see if it would come out the other side of the clouds or if we'd hear an engine from it. 

as we waited we saw a plane, with a jet trail, pass by lower down in a straight line. this time we heard the plane clearly after a few seconds. when we got to see the photos we realised it was pretty unusual.
content.summary: While admiring sunset a glowing object was observed rising up and then a trail.

content.detailedDescription: In spokane washington, was going east on i90 to work mid july in 2012 at a little past 6:30am. i noticed a very large white orb with a faint orange tint. appearing larger then the sun at the time ,south east in the sky. i first thought nothing of it, still finding it odd that its larger then the sun, though not giving off much brightness of light, nor moving.  i felt calm & at peace watching the object as a friend drove that morning. i brought the topic up but no one in the car wanted to hear it. so i just watched if for a good 20+ min's. it didn't move, just sat with a non'bright glow' of white light about it, appearing larger then the sun. i looked away for a single moment at something on the road, look'd back and it was gone. simple as that.
content.summary: Large low altitude white glowing orb'. stationary for 30+ min's. second i look away its gone.

content.detailedDescription: I was talking on the phone when the ufo materialised hovering in the garden of my homes. i was about ten years old. it looked very much like a ufo cartoon with two deep plates put together and a small plate on top. there was round windows all the way around a the center of the two plates and around the small plate on top. it never appeared really solid, and when i began thinking to get a camera it vanished, it had no color. i would say diameter was approx 8meters and 4meters high. the construction appeared to be to small to fit humans. at least that was my thought at that time.
content.summary: Ufo materialised and dematerialised in my garden.

content.detailedDescription:
While standing in the street in front of the house, i observed a streak of light in the sky traveling w to sw.  the streak seemed to be at least 10 miles away.  there was no sound associated with the light.  i was able to get my phone out and take a picture of the streak across the sky.  it was visible for about 15 seconds.  the streak disappeared immediately, there was no fading of the streak.  

included with this report are two photos.  the first is the original, showing the streak, and two stars, pollux and castor, in the western sky.  the second photo is the same photo with the stars identified and circled with paint shop pro.  no other alterations were made to either photo.  the location of the prominent stars and the time of evening will accurately show the location of the light streak.
content.summary: Light streak in the sky, moved to sw about 7 inches across sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was indoors while my wife was out on the front porch stargazing.  she saw what looked like a bright planet in the western sky that she had not noticed before so she focused on it for a minute. the object began to move very slowly towards the south. the object moved so slowly that at first she was not sure it was moving.  when she was sure the object was indeed moving she came inside to get me.  i went outdoors and observed a bright glowing planet sized object approx 75 degrees above the western horizon traveling south at approx 5000 feet elevation.  grabbed a pair of binoculars that we keep on a porch table and observed the object best described as a luminescent pearl that wobbled erratically as it moved silently across the night sky.  the object continued on it's southern trajectory as it traveled out of sight.  the entire sighting lasted between two to three minutes.  went back outside about 10 minutes later to look for more objects but none were observed.  

this is the sixth time we have observed this and similar phenomenon at this location.
content.summary: Bright glowing stationary object began to move slowly.

content.detailedDescription: At 8:15pm on saturday 4/27/13 was in our private backyard with both daughters.  backyard is located near west street on the east bank of the east river in the greenpoint section of brooklyn ny and has unobstructed view of manhattan skyline as well as open sky from south to north.  observed were a series of 3-4 yellow-orange glowing orbs; they moved from south to north.  the distance from point of observance appeared to be about 3/4 of a mile which would place them on the west bank of the east river on the manhattan side.  the 3 objects which remained equidistant from one another moved from south to north at about 30 degrees and at a speed greater (about 30% to 50% faster) than what i know to be standard commercial aircraft (lga is nearby and there were many other planes in the sky). the objects would then move up at a steeper angle (about 45 degrees) in their northward journey until no longer visible.  my guess is the orbs reached an altitude greater than 30,000 feet then were longer visible.  what makes this event of note is about every 4 minutes, 3 and sometimes 4 more orbs would make the identical journey across the sky.  there were at least 20 orbs observed.  my daughters took notice of this; the older one was scared--neither my younger nor myself was scared just more awestruck.  i perused the web for any other sightings as described, but see nothing although noticed many, many similar sightings have occurred elsewhere; e.G. western new york state and arizona as i recall seeing in a youtube video.  being this is new york city, someone else (or many others) must have witnessed the same event.
content.summary: 20 bright objects moving s-n in groups of 3-4 over 45 minutes

content.detailedDescription: We were setting up our telescope getting ready to see saturn rise in lisbon maine at 9:00pm. we first observed a red stationary light in a round form pulsing.We immediately thought it was a ufo. it then started traveling north and was flashing and then disappeared. soon after that we saw a very small pin of white light traveling quickly in the same direction. after that we saw another larger much larger red light rise from behind the tree line heading north for only a short distance and that too to just completely disappeared.After this sighting my mother was freaking out with joy and i was not that excited because i have seen things like this in the sky before.
content.summary: Bright red light came above treeline, 2 other objects followed then all disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I was visiting friends��� home in downtown salt lake city (locals would call the area the liberty park or trolley square neighborhood). we were enjoying a backyard fire, and at the moment 2 of us were outside while the 3rd went inside momentarily. i was laying down on my back passively looking at the sky while talking to my friend, when i suddenly noticed a light directly above my body moving from west to east. it was moving deliberately. my first instinct was that it was a satellite, but quickly realized that it was a lot brighter and moving much faster than any satellite i had seen before. i pointed this out to my friend and he jumped up and said ���look! there are more over there, 2 of them!��� i scramble to my feet, and said ���where, where!?��� he pointed into a dark piece of sky north northwest direction. i then saw what looked like two light grey or light tan masses that seemed to be moving at the exact same pace and direction. the objects looked like they had somewhat of a v-like shape to them. they were very difficult to see, but looked like they had mass to them, meaning they were darker in the center of the vehicles, and their silhouettes were fuzzy and difficult to define. the best way i could describe it was that they were ���cloaked���, and required a bit of effort to see. i lost sight of them once, and then found them again about ten seconds later; again, moving at the exact same pace, and heading the exact same direction. there were no lights on the objects whatsoever save for a random pinhole-like orange light that would blink periodically (i think i saw the dim orange blink 3 times).

 the entire thing lasted somewhere between 45-90 seconds; long enough for me to look back at my friend and realize that we were both absolutely seeing something that was abnormal to what is commonly in the sky. 

in the aftermath of the incident, and in accounting to his spouse what had just happened, we realized that there were some major differences in what we saw (he saw lights, i didn't, his seemed very far away, mine seemed to be a little closer).  we had no choice but to determine that we saw different things. what we cannot deny, however is that we both saw something simultaneously, and that there was an unshakable sense that the presence of all these objects were absolutely related to one another.
content.summary: Sighting in salt lake city

content.detailedDescription:
Myself and a friend were traveling west on route 406 following another friend home from morehead, kentucky.  we were in our vehicle about to cross the bridge which crosses cave run lake and marks the county line of rowan and morgan counties.  suddenly a green orb which looked to be about the size of 2 beachballs came into our line of site traveling straight down at a steady speed in a very few seconds it made a perfect 90 degree turn and headed north traveling over the lake until it was out of sight.  we immediately slowed down to watch and then blinked our lights at our friend in front of us to pull over into the nearby boat landing which is known as popping rock. their was no one there and no boats out, besides this was way too far off the ground to be anything of the sort. also, there were no nearby powerlines which could have created this.  that was actually the second time i have seen this green orb, about 10 years earlier i  saw the exact same orb, and if memory serves me well it seemed to be traveling at very similar speeds. this is the first time i have reported anything of the sort and actually had one other event happen to me about 7 years ago in morehead which involved myself and a friend.  i would be happy to share this with anyone interested, i am just not going into details here because of the length of time which has passed since. please contact me by phone if interested.

thanks,

donnie langdon
content.summary: Orb appeared heading downward toward ground, at appx. 200 ft. it made perfect 90 degree turn northward at steady speed

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my porch and looking up at the sky (i always do). then it was like out of nowhere this odd shaped thing (which at first i thought it was some sort of falling material) i just watched as it flew over my house with no sound no light and no emission. this has not been the first time i've seen a ufo by my house but but this was very odd and was so much different then the others. its hard to explain.
content.summary: Scary!
